description: Aleksander has the radioactive barrels moved from the cave into a truck.

description: They hear a strange sound in the caves and flee to hide in the bunker.

description: Martha use the time travel machine again.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Jonas and Martha arrive to Martha's world and Martha says that is the beginning of everything.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Jonas visits the school Martha doesn't recognize him and she is dating with Kilian Obendorf.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Jonas visits the cemetery and discovers that Michael's grave is missing. Instead, he sees Regina's grave.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Jonas talks with Martha and she has a déjà vu (or a glitch in the matrix).

description: Eve, old Martha, explains to Jonas that he doesn't exists in her world because Mikkel didn't travel to 1986. and yet, both worlds are damned.

description: Ulrich thinks that someone has killed a child and put the clothes that Mads was wearing when he disappeared 33 years ago.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Martha says goodbye to her mother.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Teen Jonas and teen Martha are going to intercept the truck with the barrels.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Teen Martha gets injured. Teen Jonas recognizes the wound on her face: the Martha who brought him to Eve's world had the same scar. He stops in his tracks, unsure of who he can trust.

description: Charlotte asks Aleksander to view the schedules of his employees in 1986.

description: Alexsander tiedemann reveals his true identity to Bartoszk.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Teen Martha cut her hair ...

description: Eve explains to Jonas that they are adam and eve, and they must save all of them.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Eve explains to Jonas that they are connected by an invisible ribbon and show him the saint christopher medallion that he gave to her.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Eve ask teen Jonas to help teen martha to see her future.

description: Teen Martha and teen Jonas arrive to Eve's base.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Female stranger explains to Martha that an apocalypse will happen in 2 days and everyone will die. They must stop it.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Female stranger explains to Jonas there is no way to save both worlds. He must choose one of them. If he wants Mikkel to live he must sacrifice his Martha, his world.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Teen Martha runs away. Jonas explains to her that he just wants to make all of this right again.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Teen Martha and Jonas come back to 2019.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)

description: Female stranger consuels future teen Martha.

description: Female stranger writes again Martha's letter.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Eve explains that there is a there is a switch point in the loop of time. The moment when she decides to takes jonas to her world or not.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: It creates two overlapping realities. Both realities repet endless in the loop. One triggers the other.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adam is trying to destroy this loop so the "origin" will never born.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Eve moves each of her tokens into position.

description: The unknown enter the room and the boy goes to hug Martha. His son will only live if the knot is preserved.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Everything must occur as it always. Martha must do what has always been done.

description: Old Claudia, impersonated as old Claudia (Martha's world), meets Eve and she gives her the time machine's blueprints for H.G. Tannhaus.
